Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

Since the release I cannot select 16:10 resolutions like 1920x1200 and 2560 x 1600, actually the only resolutions I get is 1920x1080 and 1280x720.

Machine is Legion 5 Pro / AMD Ryzen 7 5800H (Radeon Graphics) / RTX3070 / 32GB.

 

To do so I have to edit the config file.

 

Hope you  make it work,

Best,
